desc: By adding a bit of creativity to your event, project, video or adventure we turn your experience into a life long memory. We offer smoke grenades, confetti cannons, sparklers, flying lanterns, gender reveal, LED glow sticks and much much more.

layout.text: Enola Gaye is the global leader in the design and manufacture of colored smoke effects also know as Smoke emitters and Smoke Grenades for commercial and professional use. EG smoke bombs are the world’s most popular colored smoke devices, and emit the most advanced smoke on the market.
